objects.specification: The floor is a flat horizontal plane rendered in a warm earth tone, featuring a subtle rough stone-like texture reminiscent of an ancient cave floor. It has a matte finish with slight surface irregularities to add realism and evoke a prehistoric atmosphere.

This wall is a large vertical surface with an earth-toned plaster finish that mimics natural sandstone, exhibiting a slightly rough, matte texture. It forms the front boundary of the classroom and supports mounted fixtures in a prehistoric-themed interior.

This wall is a large vertical surface with an earth-toned plaster finish that mimics natural sandstone, exhibiting a slightly rough, matte texture. It forms the rear boundary of the classroom and supports decorative elements in a prehistoric-themed interior.

This wall is a broad vertical plane clad in an earth-toned plaster with a matte finish and slight texture, evoking a natural rock surface for a prehistoric atmosphere. It supports wall-mounted educational decor and functional elements.

This wall is a broad vertical plane clad in an earth-toned plaster with a matte finish and slight texture, evoking a natural rock surface for a prehistoric atmosphere. It supports fixtures such as windows and decorative posters.

The teacher's desk is a sturdy rectangular table crafted from dark wood with visible grain patterns and slightly rounded edges. Its polished surface has a satin finish for subtle sheen, supported by four solid legs and featuring a modesty panel on the front.

The student desk is a simple rectangular table with a light wood grain texture, smooth varnished finish, and gently rounded corners. It is supported by slender metal legs and optimized for writing and reading tasks.

The student chair features a contoured seat and backrest made of matte green molded plastic, supported by slender metal legs with rubber feet. It is ergonomically shaped for comfort and durability.

The writing board is a large rectangular surface with a smooth dark green finish, framed by a slim metal border. It is wall-mounted flush and includes a shallow chalk tray along the bottom edge for convenience.

The projector is a compact ceiling-mounted unit with a white plastic casing, visible ventilation grilles, and a front-facing lens. It is affixed with a slim adjustable bracket and features subtle LED indicator lights.
This ceiling light is a square LED panel with a white translucent diffuser and a thin metal housing. It provides soft, even illumination with minimal glare.

This educational poster is a flat rectangular panel featuring vivid dinosaur illustrations and informational text. It has a matte finish and a thin frame to minimize reflections while mounted flush to the wall.

The bookshelf is a tall wooden unit with natural wood grain finish and multiple open shelves. It is filled with assorted dinosaur-related books and small models, featuring a solid back panel and simple rectangular design.
The wall clock is a circular analog clock with a white face, bold black numerals and hands, encased in a slim metal frame. The glass cover adds a subtle reflection.

The dinosaur skeleton is a large model composed of interconnected off-white bone-like elements arranged in an anatomically accurate pose. It is textured with slight surface roughness and supported by a discreet metal stand.
The potted plant features lush green foliage with varied leaf shapes and slight natural gloss, set in a matte ceramic pot. The soil is visible at the top for added realism.
The waste bin is a cylindrical container made of dark grey plastic with a ribbed exterior texture and an open top. It has a matte finish and sits directly on the floor.

The window is a rectangular glass pane set in a thin white frame, accompanied by semi-transparent curtains of light neutral fabric. The glass has a slight reflective quality, and the curtains are gently gathered to the sides.
